series.title: The Orbiting Human Circus (of the Air)
series.author: Night Vale Presents

episodes.seriesTitle: The Orbiting Human Circus (of the Air)
episodes.title: Season One, Bonus Episode (your questions)
episodes.summary:
Julian reveals the behind-the-scenes secrets and stories of the Orbiting Human Circus (and answers your questions!) in this special bonus episode.

If you liked the songs the Janitor sang on the show, you can get them on a new EP by the Music Tapes called The Orbiting Human Circus, out on Merge Records on February 10, 2017 (and available for pre-order on February 8). For more information, go to mergerecords.com or orbitinghumancircus.com.

We will be back with Season Two! In the meantime, keep checking orbitinghumancircus.com for news about 2017 tour dates and a different Orbiting Human Circus podcast to come this spring!

Thanks to Rocket Mortgage by Quicken Loans for supporting our show. Check out Rocket Mortgage’s transparent, totally online home loan process today at QuickenLoans.com/OHC.

Written and created by Julian Koster. Co-directed by and developed with Ellie Heyman. Produced by Christy Gressman. Featuring musical composition and arrangement by Thomas Hughes and music by The Music Tapes.

Full credits: www.orbitinghumancircus.com

Part of the Night Vale Presents network: www.nightvalepresents.com

episodes.seriesTitle: The Orbiting Human Circus (of the Air)
episodes.title: Season One, Episode 8
episodes.summary:
The fate of the janitor—and the show—hang in the balance as the Orbiting Human Circus races towards its breathtaking conclusion!

Featuring John Cameron Mitchell, Julian Koster, Drew Callander, and Susannah Flood, with Cecil Baldwin and Shannon Conley.

2017 tour dates—and other exciting announcements—coming soon at www.orbitinghumancircus.com/shows.

Thanks to Rocket Mortgage by Quicken Loans and Blue Apron for supporting our show. Check out this week’s menu and get your first three meals free—with free shipping—by going to BlueApron.com/OHC, and check out Rocket Mortgage's transparent, totally online home loan process today at QuickenLoans.com/OHC.

Written and created by Julian Koster. Co-directed by and developed with Ellie Heyman. Produced by Christy Gressman. Featuring musical composition and arrangement by Thomas Hughes and music by The Music Tapes.

Full credits: www.orbitinghumancircus.com

episodes.title: Season One, Episode 7
episodes.summary:
Hold onto your hats – extraordinary events strike the Orbiting Human Circus!

Featuring John Cameron Mitchell, Julian Koster, and Drew Callander.

A new part of the janitor’s story will be told live in 2017. Tour dates coming soon at www.orbitinghumancircus.com/shows.

episodes.seriesTitle: The Orbiting Human Circus (of the Air)
episodes.title: Season One, Episode 6
episodes.summary:
A special tale for the holiday season—or any season. Plus, the saws sing for the janitor!

Featuring Larry “Ratso” Sloman, John Cameron Mitchell, Julian Koster, and Drew Callander.

A new part of the janitor's story will be told live in 2017. Check www.orbitinghumancircus.com/shows, beginning in early 2017, for tour dates.

Thanks to Rocket Mortgage by Quicken Loans and Audible for their generous support of the show! Get a free audiobook with a 30 day free trial  at audible.com/OHC, and check out Rocket Mortgage today at QuickenLoans.com/OHC.

Written and created by Julian Koster. Co-directed by and developed with Ellie Heyman. Produced by Christy Gressman. Featuring musical composition and arrangement by Thomas Hughes and music by The Music Tapes.

episodes.seriesTitle: The Orbiting Human Circus (of the Air)
episodes.title: Season One, Episode 5
episodes.summary:
An on-air hypnosis demonstration goes horribly wrong. Plus: the janitor sings!

Thanks to Rocket Mortgage by Quicken Loans for their generous support of the show! Check out Rocket Mortgage at www.QuickenLoans.com/OHC.

The next chapter of the janitor’s story will be told live in 2017, all around the world. Check www.orbitinghumancircus.com/shows in the coming weeks for new tour dates.

Featuring John Cameron Mitchell as Mr. Cameron, Julian Koster as the Janitor, and Drew Callander as the Narrator, with Cecil Baldwin, Ben Chase, and JJ Gonson as Third Grade Teacher Whistling the Sabre Dance.

Written and created by Julian Koster. Co-directed by and developed with Ellie Heyman. Produced by Christy Gressman. Featuring musical composition and arrangement by Thomas Hughes and music by The Music Tapes.

Full credits: www.orbitinghumancircus.com

Part of the Night Vale Presents network: www.nightvalepresents.com

episodes.seriesTitle: The Orbiting Human Circus (of the Air)
episodes.title: Season One, Episode 4 (The Janitor's Nights)
episodes.summary:
Hear the tale of history’s greatest rhythmic genius, meet a remarkable platypus, and follow the janitor as he wanders Paris by night.

Thank you for listening! Help support the show by taking our audience survey at www.orbitinghumancircus.com/survey and email a screenshot of the last page of your completed survey to podcast@orbitinghumancircus.com for a chance to win a pillowcase signed by the janitor.

Featuring John Cameron Mitchell as Mr. Cameron, Julian Koster as the Janitor, and Drew Callander as the Narrator, with Susannah Flood as Leticia Saltier and Brian Dewan as the Spokesperson of the Perpetual Broadcasting Corporation.

Written and created by Julian Koster. Co-directed by and developed with Ellie Heyman. Produced by Christy Gressman. Featuring musical composition and arrangement by Thomas Hughes and music by The Music Tapes.

Full credits: www.orbitinghumancircus.com

Part of the Night Vale Presents network: www.nightvalepresents.com

episodes.seriesTitle: The Orbiting Human Circus (of the Air)
episodes.title: Season One, Episode 3
episodes.summary:
Will the famed storytelling cricket (Tim Robbins) return? Plus, Charlie Day and Mary Elizabeth Ellis perform Shakespeare as you’ve never heard it and the janitor pushes host John Cameron to the very brink.

Thanks to Rocket Mortgage by Quicken Loans and HelloFresh for supporting our podcast! Go to HelloFresh.com and use the code OHC to get $35 off your first week of deliveries, and check out Rocket Mortgage at QuickenLoans.com/OHC.

In November 2016, the janitor will be cleaning a venue near you! Upcoming tour dates: www.orbitinghumancircus.com

Featuring John Cameron Mitchell as Mr. Cameron, Julian Koster as the Janitor, and Drew Callander as the Narrator, with Tim Robbins as the Cricket, Charlie Day as Macbeth, and Mary Elizabeth Ellis and Lady Macbeth, and the Alicia Svigals Klezmer Ensemble featuring the late Evan Harlan (Julian's uncle) on accordion and North the Singing Saw.

Written and created by Julian Koster. Co-directed by and developed with Ellie Heyman. Produced by Christy Gressman. Featuring musical composition and arrangement by Thomas Hughes and music by The Music Tapes.

Full credits: www.orbitinghumancircus.com

Part of the Night Vale Presents network: www.nightvalepresents.com

episodes.seriesTitle: The Orbiting Human Circus (of the Air)
episodes.title: Season One, Episode 2 (The Cricket)
episodes.summary:
Hear Mandy Patinkin perform an extraordinary musicological demonstration and a cricket (Tim Robbins) spin the spellbinding tale of Ladislas Koskovsky. Plus, learn the remarkable history of Julian the janitor's famous great-grandfather.

Thanks to Audible and Atom Tickets for supporting the show! Get a free audiobook with a 30 day free trial at audible.com/OHC. Download the free Atom Tickets app from Google Play or the Apple App Store and use code OHC for $5 off.

In November 2016, the janitor will be cleaning a venue near you! Upcoming tour dates: www.orbitinghumancircus.com

Featuring John Cameron Mitchell as Mr. Cameron, Julian Koster as the Janitor, and Drew Callander as the Narrator, with Tim Robbins as the Cricket and Mandy Patinkin as Cantor Moishe Lebowitz

Written and created by Julian Koster. Co-directed by and developed with Ellie Heyman. Produced by Christy Gressman. Featuring musical composition and arrangement by Thomas Hughes and music by The Music Tapes

Full credits: www.orbitinghumancircus.com

Part of the Night Vale Presents network: www.nightvalepresents.com

episodes.seriesTitle: The Orbiting Human Circus (of the Air)
episodes.title: Season One, Episode 1
episodes.summary:
Welcome to the world of The Orbiting Human Circus: discover the surreally impossible radio show broadcast from the top of the Eiffel Tower, meet the lonely janitor who longs to become part of it, and settle in for the chilling tale of Goolsby and Rue.

Thanks to Rocket Mortgage by Quicken Loans and Atom Tickets for supporting the show! Download the free Atom Tickets app from Google Play or the Apple App Store and use code OHC for $5 off through the end of the year. Check out Rocket Mortgage at QuickenLoans.com/OHC.

Featuring John Cameron Mitchell as Mr. Cameron, Julian Koster as the Janitor, and Drew Callander as the Narrator. For full credits, go to www.orbitinghumancircus.com.

Written and created by Julian Koster. Co-directed by and developed with Ellie Heyman. Produced by Christy Gressman. Featuring musical composition and arrangement by Thomas Hughes and music by The Music Tapes.

In November 2016, the Janitor will be cleaning a venue near you! See tour dates at www.orbitinghumancircus.com.

Part of the Night Vale Presents network. www.nightvalepresents.com

episodes.seriesTitle: The Orbiting Human Circus (of the Air)
episodes.title: The Orbiting Human Circus (of the Air) - Teaser
episodes.summary:
A brand new podcast from Night Vale Presents, created by Julian Koster (Neutral Milk Hotel). Season One premieres on October 12. New episodes every other Wednesday through February 1, 2017.

Subscribe now via iTunes or your favorite podcast player via orbitinghumancircus.libsyn.com. For more information, go to nightvalepresents.com.

For Orbiting Human Circus tour dates: orbitinghumancircus.com
